Text:
I was saddened to see the first potential seeder of this file drop off without any hanging around....

This film is certified Public Domain material.... That means freely redistributable... which means no mpaa trying to hump your leg for money if download this... just FREEdom to seed your heart out. 

Here is a link to what Public Domain means for those that desire more info.

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/publicdomain/
sLiver0ne, please seed again. This was a pretty good movie. I don't pay any attention to the critics.
